data.partBlankContent: Regenerative heat exchangers store heat and release it later. They con____ a la___ mass o_ material wh___ does n__ leave t__ exchanger b__ heats u_ ( o_ in so__ cases, melts, absorbing lat___ heat ) as h__ fluid i_ passed thr____. Thus heat from one batch operation can be used to warm up the next one.
data.fullContent: Regenerative heat exchangers store heat and release it later. They contain a large mass of material which does not leave the exchanger but heats up ( or in some cases, melts, absorbing latent heat ) as hot fluid is passed through. Thus heat from one batch operation can be used to warm up the next one.
data.answer: 蓄热式换热器储存热量，然后再释放。它们含有大量的物质，当热流体通过时，这些物质不会离开换热器，而是加热(或在某些情况下，熔化，吸收潜在热量)。因此，一批操作的热量可以用来加热下一批操作。
